Subbu Allamaraju wrote:
>
> I am sorry but you are misinterpreting. HTML Clients NEVER create or  
> establish links between resources. They USE the URIs provided in links  
> (link, a, img etc) and forms to navigate across resources.
>
> Subbu
>   

Those aren't mutually exclusive behaviours, are they?

I don't follow the logic here
